system.description:
Operating, controlling, and navigating interplanetary and interstellar space craft, both in real space and in jump space. This includes knowledge of astrogation, plotting space jumps and reading charts.
• Plot jump: roll Piloting (EDU) 4+, or Piloting (EDU) 8+ if in a rush.
• Get the better Position in space combat: opposed check of Piloting + each ship's Thrust rating.
• Provide starship attack vectors in space combat: roll Piloting (INT) 8+.
• Attempt evasive maneuvers in space combat: roll Piloting (INT) 12+.
• Attempt to disengage from space combat: opposed check of Piloting (DEX) vs. the pursuer's pilot, adding each ship’s Thrust rating.
• Attempt emergency jump in space combat: roll Piloting (DEX) 6+.
• Dock with an enemy ship in space combat: roll Piloting (DEX) 12+.
